settings.description: Controls who is able to see or download your email address.

Allow hosts and participants to record the meeting to a computer. The recording will include video and shared content matching the recorder's view options, and an audio-only file.

settings.setting: Auto approve their permission requests (for Internal meeting participants)
settings.description: Automatically approve recording permission requests from internal meeting participants.
